thread.title: Liam Payne and Cheryl Cole Welcomed Their First Baby With an Adorable Instagram Announcement
thread.title_full: Liam Payne and Cheryl Cole Welcomed Their First Baby With an Adorable Instagram Announcement

title: Liam Payne and Cheryl Cole Welcomed Their First Baby With an Adorable Instagram Announcement
text:
Liam Payne and Cheryl Cole Welcomed Their First Baby With an Adorable Instagram Announcement 
The One Direction family just grew. Most Popular Liam Payne and Cheryl have finally had their baby! Advertisement - Continue Reading Below As Cheryl never made an official pregnancy announcement, we have all been in the dark about when the baby was due, but now we can all finally breathe a sigh of relief because baby Payne is here and he is adorable (just like his mom...and dad). Yes, I said HE because our Chezza has given birth to a baby boy. A post shared by Cheryl (@cherylofficial) on Mar 25, 2017 at 1:25pm PDT Most Popular Both Cheryl and Liam took to Instagram to share the news with the cutest snap we have seen all year and if you haven't melted yet Cheryl's accompanying caption will surely do it: "On Wednesday 22nd March Liam and I became parents to an incredibly beautiful, healthy baby boy, weighing 7lb 9 and looking like a dream. Although he still doesn't have a name he is already stealing hearts. We are all madly in love and overwhelmingly happy with our little arrival. Happy Mother's Day to all the mothers around the world. A day that now has a different meaning to me forever ï’™ " But wait till you hear Liam's caption: "My close friends and family know there are very few times when I'm left speechless...wow! I'm incredibly happy to welcome our new baby boy into the world, it's a moment that I will never forget for the rest of my life and my favourite memory I have so far. I'm completely in awe of his incredible mother and how she has been the whole way through this, she's really made my dreams come true. We haven't named him yet but he's already capturing hearts including mine. I feel very blessed. Happy Mothers Day everyone!" We're not crying, you are! We are so, so, happy for the pair, that's one pretty special Mother's Day present. And guys if you need any help picking a name, just give us a shout. More from ELLE:
